code: import"./App.css";import{useState}from"react";import logo from"./ethereumLogo.svg";import{Select}from"antd";import{Routes,Route}from"react-router-dom";import Home from"./components/Home";import CreateAccount from"./components/CreateAccount";import RecoverAccount from"./components/RecoverAccount";import WalletView from"./components/WalletView";import{ToastContainer}from'react-toastify';import'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[wallet,setWallet]=useState(null);const[seedPhrase,setSeedPhrase]=useState(null);const[selectedChain,setSelectedChain]=useState("0x1");return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,className:"headerLogo",alt:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ToastContainer,{position:"top-right",autoClose:5000,hideProgressBar:false,newestOnTop:true,closeOnClick:true,rtl:false,pauseOnFocusLoss:true,draggable:true,pauseOnHover:true,theme:"light",style:{width:"auto",maxWidth:"450px",marginTop:"60px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Select,{onChange:val=>setSelectedChain(val),value:selectedChain,options:[{label:"Ethereum",value:"0x1"},{label:"Polygon",value:"0x89"},{label:"Sepolia Testnet",value:"0xaa36a7"}],className:"dropdown"})]}),wallet&&seedPhrase?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Routes,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/yourwallet",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WalletView,{wallet:wallet,setWallet:setWallet,seedPhrase:seedPhrase,setSeedPhrase:setSeedPhrase,selectedChain:selectedChain})})}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/recover",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RecoverAccount,{setSeedPhrase:setSeedPhrase,setWallet:setWallet})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/yourwallet",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CreateAccount,{setSeedPhrase:setSeedPhrase,setWallet:setWallet})})]})]});}export default App;
